column4: Hi, I was hoping someone could help. when i installed ubuntu on my macbook it got a red light in the audio jack and no sound comes out the headphones or internal speakers. what would be the solution to this?
I don't own a mac, but I'm pretty sure the red light you see is normal. It's an optical way to detect that a cable is inserted rather than by electrica means
well if it isn't what I guess then I have no idea, don't own a mac so I'm afraid I can't help you any further
